content.rendered:
Updated January 2023 to take into account the latest changes, our Building Regulations Accompanying Notes will save you time and money when making a Building Regulations application.

Adding technical detail and a professional, authoritative depth to your application, our Building Regulations Accompanying Notes will demonstrate to your local Building Control department that your proposals are compliant.

This editable Microsoft Word document provides a comprehensive list of notes to accompany a Building Regulations Application. Text can be amended to suit your particular project requirements and then copied-and-pasted onto drawings or submitted as a standalone written document in support of a ‘Full Plans’ application.

Our sixty-one-page download covers the essential information required to support drawings submitted for consideration under the Building Regulations, including:

  • Site preparation                                                                 
  • Foundations                                                                       
  • Substructure      
  • External Walls
  • Roofing
  • Fire Safety & Means of Escape
  • Internal Works
  • Electrical Installations
  • Sanitary, Hot Water Safety & Water Efficiency
  • Combustion Appliances & Fuel Storage
  • External Works
  • Foul Water Drainage
  • Materials & Workmanship

The notes have been designed to complement our range of standard details, and are fully editable so that they can be customised to suit many different combinations of construction methods. Our Building Regulations Accompanying Notes have been trusted by more than 700 customers since we launched this product in 2017.

Who is this product for?

This product can be used by anyone preparing a ‘Full Plans’ Building Regulations application, whether the project is a one-off or you plan to use the notes for more than one building project. Many of our customers are professionals such as architects, quantity surveyors, project managers and the like. Our template not only saves you having to check the requirements yourself, it also allows you to keep up with the regular changes introduced by the Department for Levelling Up, Housing and Communities and Ministry of Housing, Communities & Local Government.

What have previous customers said?

Exactly what I was looking for, quick and easy transaction, 100% satisfied – David T.

I copied the text and pasted it into Autocad multi-line text without a hitch. I just needed to change a few words to represent my exact circumstances . Saved me hours of typing and allowed me to get on with the designing. – Peter

This is a great template for producing project specific specs. Thanks Guys. – John K.

Notes to accompany building regs which I downloaded absolutely great could not find this amount of spec anywhere else… – Dave R.

It’s a good piece of kit if you are in the construction business for specifications – Easy to edit and a professional looking document – Steven A.

For more genuine customer reviews, see our Trustpilot page.

 

Want to see what you get for your money before you buy? Download a free sample here or contact us in the event of any queries.
